name: Alexey's Winter: Night adventure
description:
Alexey's Winter: Night Adventure


is a point and click adventure game.
The story takes us back to the USSR at the end of the eighties and has a typical, recognizable atmosphere.
The story follows a young man, Alexey, that gets locked out from his apartment on a dark snowy evening. He is on a quest of finding his keys.
In the beginning Alexey is equipped with nothing but a small searchlight to explore his surroundings and a package of sausages.
Interact with different characters and items and try to figure out who stole your keys. The story is filled with funny dialogues and unexpected combinations.

In the second episode the story of Alexey continues, but this time he is looking for something else...



The game is completely hand drawn and creates a unique atmosphere. It can be played either in English or in Russian and all it needs for input is a mouse.





FAQ

Will there be a third episode?

There might be a third episode in the future. Either as part of the game or DLC.

How is a game saved?

A save game is automatically created when you quit the game in a normal way. It will be stored on the local computer only.
The savegame file will be called GameData.json.

How to change the language after I have chosen it already?

The only way to reset your language choice is to manually delete the savegame and lose all of your current progress, so be careful.
